description:
Lina`s gang ends up in the middle of a war between two rival nations. Aiding one side in the long-standing conflict could be Inverse`s only path to freedom.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Continuous Fire! The Wind-Swept Shore of Battle!
Tirs continus ! La côte de la bataille !
連続発射! 戦いの荒磯!
